name: Project: Advent
description:
This is the story of Nero, a talented mage from the secluded town of Baenum. During a fateful adventure into an abandoned fort, Nero is transported to a strange realm where he learns of a grand destiny that a being known as "the Architects" has in store for him. What follows is a journey far from home, into lands unknown, where Nero meets new friends, makes new enemies, and learns the truth about his place in the world.

Currently in development, players can journey to the first major hub city and take on quests for the Adventurers' Guild in this early access build.
